description.date: A date string in any format or a unix timestamp.
description.size: The size of the datebadge. Can be either 'sm', 'md' or 'lg'.
description.translucent: If true, the datebadge will have a translucent background.
description.color: The color of the datebadge. Can be either 'light', 'dark', 'primary', 'secondary'.
